FuncDef:
The info-center logfile compression lzma command sets the user log compression algorithm to lzma.
The undo info-center logfile compression command restores the user log compression algorithm to the default value deflate. The info-center logfile compression lzma command sets the user log compression algorithm to lzma. The undo info-center logfile compression command restores the user log compression algorithm to the default value deflate. By default, Deflate is used to compress user logs.
ExtraInfo: You can run this command to set the user log compression algorithm to lzma or restore the default value deflate.
